size.summary: Information on how much space a package requires.

all.doc: display information for all installed packages

allchannels.doc: list packages from all channels, not just the default one

csv.doc: output results in CSV format (sizes are measured in bytes).

human-readable.doc: print sizes in human readable format (for example: 492 B 1KB 7MB)

si.doc: likewise, but use powers of 1000 not 1024

type.doc: specify what type of files are required for the report

killzero.doc: do not output zero values in verbose mode
